content: The Elder Amourworm is an optional Yaoguai Chief boss fight that you can find during Chapter 4 of Black Myth Wukong. Located in the middle section of The Webbed Hollow, this creepy worm hides on an outer cliff past a trove of treasure.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Elder_Amourworm.md', within the main section titled 'Elder Amourworm'.
The content is as follows:
The Elder Amourworm is an optional Yaoguai Chief boss fight that you can find during Chapter 4 of Black Myth Wukong. Located in the middle section of The Webbed Hollow, this creepy worm hides on an outer cliff past a trove of treasure.
